requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or greater
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: ２ GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card. Stereo headphones are recommended.
  • Additional Notes: Available in 16:9 aspect ratio only. 30FPS in 1920x1080 with the highest settings.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or greater
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1650 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: ２ GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card. Stereo headphones are recommended. To enable spatial sound, you need to enable Windows Sonic, Dolby Atmos, or DTS Sound Unbound.
  • Additional Notes: Available in 16:9 aspect ratio only. 60FPS in 1920x1080 with the highest settings. Raytracing is available only on Geforce RTX.
